xmp_property.name: videoBitRate
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11s/videoBitRate_description=The total video bit rate of the encoded file in bits per second.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11s/videoBitRate_label=Video Bit Rate

xmp_property.name: videoCodec
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11s/videoCodec_description=The video codec employed for the creation of the file.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11s/videoCodec_label=Video Codec

xmp_property.name: videoCodecParameters
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11s/videoCodecParameters_description=The detailed codec profile and level information used to create the file.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11s/videoCodecParameters_label=Video Codec Parameters

xmp_property.name: pictureFormat
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11s/pictureFormat_description=The signal standard (frame resolution and aspect ratio) of the encoded file.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11s/pictureFormat_label=Picture Format

xmp_property.name: afd
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11s/afd_description=(*Required) The Active Format Description (AFD) is a 4-bit code describing a video picture in terms of the aspect ratio and other characteristics of the active image within the coded frame.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11s/afd_label=Active Format Description Code *

xmp_property.name: audioSamplingFrequency
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11s/audioSamplingFrequency_description=The audio sampling frequency used in kHz.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11s/audioSamplingFrequency_label=Audio Sampling Frequency

xmp_property.name: audioBitDepth
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11s/audioBitDepth_description=No. of quantisation bits in the audio signal (must be the same for all audio tracks).
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11s/audioBitDepth_label=Audio Bit Depth

xmp_property.name: audioCodecParameters
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11s/audioCodecParameters_description=The audio codec employed for the creation of the file.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11s/audioCodecParameters_label=Audio Codec Parameters
